metadata.title: CVE-2014-4720 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Email::Address module before 1.904 for Perl uses an inefficient regularexpression, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPUconsumption) via vectors related to "backtracking into the phrase," adifferent vulnerability than CVE-2014-0477.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4720` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libemail-address-perl - 1.905-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.905-2').
